title: my xayah went back 2 the shop i even got her a skin
body: it was gifted 2 me now its just gone

replies.body:
Hey ggggggggf - 

 If a player purchases RP and gifts content with it, and subsequently issues a chargeback for the money spent on that RP, we will remove that content. So, if your friend refunded the purchase, the content would be removed from your account, since it wasn't actually purchased.

If you believe that content you have received on your account has gone missing and is not due to this, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  We can look into your account and investigate further!
umm, check and see if you accidentally somehow refunded her, and yh Lumiva is right, ur more likely to get faster assistance with a support ticket being filed
instead of putting this in bugs try filling out an actual support ticket so you don't have to hope a rioter sees this
